title: "The University of Tartu machine translation engine now supports 17 new Finno-Ugric languages"
excerpt: "Researchers at the University of Tartu Institute of Computer Science have added Livonian, Komi, Veps and 14 other low-resource Finno-Ugric languages to Neurotõlge, the University’s machine translation engine."
